S

save(int) - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Save current run to file via the simulator.
setCoords(Coordinates) - Method in class mangan.Coordinates
Setter for objects with coordinates.
setDeployAlgorithm(int) - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Set the deployment algorithm by changing the DeploymentContext at runtime thanks to strategy pattern.
setEscapeDistance(int) - Method in class mangan.Robot
Setter for the escape distance which defines the escapiness of algorithm two.
setJoinDistance(int) - Method in class mangan.Robot
Setter for the join distance which defines the joininess of algorithm one.
setup() - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Processing configuration before running the main scheduler.
setVelocity(Coordinates) - Method in class mangan.Coordinates
Setter for the velocity x and y.
setX(double) - Method in class mangan.Coordinates
Setter for location x value.
setY(double) - Method in class mangan.Coordinates
Setter for location y value.
Simulator - Class in mangan
Main class coordinating the evolution of the steps taken by the robots while interacting with them in order to provide the data they are allowed to know by the requirements, in the way they are supposed to.
start(int) - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Start the visualisation of the simulation.
sub(Coordinates) - Method in class mangan.Coordinates
To subtract two Coordinates from each other.
